li.span: Coronavirus

p.span: Information as of April 20 at 6:30 p.m.:

li.span: Superintendent Heid has posted a new update that includes answers to frequently asked questions.
District 300 has updated our mental health resources page for students
An update has been posted regarding K-5 grading and reporting
The D300 Board of Education has approved a calendar change resulting in April 20th becoming an instructional day and May 1st becoming an institute day.
Changes to meal availability are scheduled to begin on April 16.
Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19): Frequently Asked Questions - (Illinois Department of Public Health)
